My wife and I just bought our first condo and I can say that Heather and Brandon are the best in the business! Their knowledge, patience, and diligence led us to our dream home. As first time home buyers, my wife and I were new to it all. We had to learn everything that is required to make an informed decision about purchasing a home. Heather and Brandon were there every step of the way. How to walk through a unit, what to look for when reading an MLS listing, finding a great home inspector, and everything in between, they showed patience and never pushed us beyond our comfort. They built trust with us over a period of months while looking tirelessly for our future home. My wife and I had a very particular area of Vancouver that we wanted to live in. Beyond our preferred neighborhood, we had our eyes on one particular building as our ideal. When a unit in that building was finally listed, Heather and Brandon had arranged a viewing within the hour. After viewing, our trust in them helped us to quickly make an offer on our dream home. Navigating through a multiple offer situation late into the night, Heather and Brandon remained firm on our price when we were uncertain. They were able to back our offer up with data - the type of building, previous units sold in the area, etc. In the end we finalized the sale as satisfied buyers. We cannot recommend Heather and Brandon highly enough and we are happy that our relationship will continue far into the future. They are helping us plan renovations to the unit prior to us moving in, and they will certainly be our choice to represent us whenever we choose to sell in the future.

Below is the thank you letter we sent to Heather after she supported us in successfully selling our home and purchasing a new one. Dear Heather, We cannot thank you enough for your professional and immeasurable assistance in the recent sale of our home and acquisition of our new one. We were so pleased with your support, guidance and attention to detail over the past several months. The process of simultaneously buying and selling a home is tedious and emotional but your flexibility, expertise, compassion and faith enabled us to go through the process smoothly. Your determination, strong advocacy and creativity enabled us to stand out among the multiple offers during the purchase of our new home. You shared our lives with the sellers in a caring and compassionate manner, reassuring them we were the right couple to continue loving and cherishing the home that they had worked so hard to nurture over the years. In terms of selling, you effectively advertised our home and listened attentively and empathically to our needs and expectations regarding showing our home. You were personally responsible for arranging the open houses and contacting the appropriate contacts to organize all the documents, which resulted in an expedient sale. Your professionalism, positivity, openness to answering our questions and knowledgeable advice provided us with encouragement, reassurance and confidence. Your passion for real estate, humour and fun-loving nature also made the experience enjoyable and manageable. We appreciated your ability to listen openly without judgment and provide constructive feedback, ever mindful of our needs. You kept us well informed from beginning to end and the entire process was accomplished in a very professional and expeditious manner. Thank you again for your time and for sharing your knowledge and expertise with us. We would not hesitate to recommend you to our friends and family members! Gratefully, AJB
agent: HofVan Real Estate Group - Heather Mah

We are lucky (and smart) enough to have had Heather as our agent on two sales and two purchases so far. She is the right person to have on your team. In between searches, she talked us through our occasional temptations to sell our condo and made recommendations on renovations. When it was the right time to trade in our tiny condo for a townhouse, she sprang into action. We had a quick turnaround for getting our place ready to stage and when we listed, she had everything ready (including professional photos and measurements and strata docs) for any interested buyers. She helped us keep our showings to a minimum (we have a toddler) and set us up for multiple offers. A week after listing, we received seven offers and $36K over asking, thanks to her time and effort to get the price we did. We are ecstatic. Finding our next home was a stressful and fast-paced exercise in the hot market we had our eye on. Whenever a good-looking listing came up, she was already looking into it before we even had to ask. She kept our non-negotiables in mind and was available for same-day showings with little notice. She did her homework so that we were prepared to view the properties with context. She guided us through two unsuccessful bids, always keeping our best interests in mind. When the third offer situation came along, we were heading off on vacation, so she got us an early showing, got the strata documents for us to review and even attended the home inspection on our behalf. She advised us on potential risks and chased down inconsistent information. She went above and beyond (as she always does) to present our best offer and was available to answer questions every day at any hour. Even after our offer was accepted (hurray!) she worked to make sure the sellers dates lined up with our buyers dates so that everyone 'won'. We never hesitate to recommend Heather to family and friends. She'll always tell you what she thinks, she's a tiger with a big heart. She'll be your biggest cheerleader once you make an informed decision, because she wants you to be happy clients with the home you deserve.
agent: HofVan Real Estate Group - Heather Mah

It is with great confidence that I recommend Heather Mah as a real estate agent for anyone searching for a dedicated professional to assist them with the sale of their property. I have used her several times and as an out of town property owner, when I recently decided to sell my investment property in the Port Moody area it was critical that I have a professional willing to go the extra mile to ensure the property was in top shape for sale! I found Heather to be a highly competent professional who was always available when I required information. She returned all phone calls and emails promptly. Heather was honest and forthcoming with her evaluation of my property which I appreciated given it was rented for a number of years and I wanted to complete a sale in as short of time as possible and was not looking for someone to list high and have the property sit on the market. Upon listing my property Heather dealt with ensuring the property was in top shape for showings and took the initiative to ensure, among other things, that all lights were in working order prior to taking listing pictures. Heather also spent a number of hours cleaning the condo ahead of showings including thoroughly scrubbing the many layers of grime off the shower stall left by less than caring tenants. When we received an offer after a little over a week on the market, Heather worked to ensure the deal was closed with minimal back and forth at a price that was fair to both parties. Ultimately the sale was completed in 10 days when the average selling time for similar units in the area was approximately 90 days. I am pleased to recommend Heather Mah to anyone looking to buy or sell a home. She is one of the best in the business in my opinion and I would not hesitate to use her again in the future.

Integrity. Honesty. Professionalism. If these are three of the characteristics that you value in a person, then you have found the right agent. If you have read other referral letters about Heather, we experienced what those letters wrote about. We were referred to Heather by a colleague who had several purchasing and selling experiences with her over the years. We were very fortunate and blessed to have Heather and her son, Brandon, by our side during our home purchasing experience. As young and inexperienced first-time home buyers, we had no idea what to expect in the rapid, crazy Lower Mainland condo market of 2018, where prices were going up by tens of thousands dollars per month! Heather’s expertise and insights were highly valuable. She helped us set realistic expectations and provided us with tips and guidance along the way. She taught us what to look for in the surroundings, buildings, and units, as well as what were the critical documents and contents to read. Heather did not push for a sale. She told us the truth, even when it was sometimes difficult to hear – whenever a nice-looking unit did not truly match our immediate or long-term needs, she let us know. She always put our interests first. On multiple occasions, Heather was late for family events because she really wanted to show us the condos so we didn’t miss the opportunity. Heather and Brandon’s honesty, integrity, and professionalism make them role models in their profession. The world needs a lot more real estate agents like Heather and Brandon! We highly recommend Heather. We know whom to call when family, friends, colleagues, or our future selves may need to buy or sell real estate.

We had to come to Canada from the UK this year to clear and sell our Aunt’s house; we had two weeks to get things into place, which was challenging to say the least. Heather Mah was recommended to us by a mutual professional person, as Heather was also acting for her. We contacted Heather during the second week, she came to see us the next day, and the house was for sale two days after we left to come back to the UK. Heather was from the very start a reliant professional who knew the local housing market, and acted with both integrity and sympathy regarding our immediate situation. Some of the things Heather provided for us: • An initial market Analysis package. • She gave good advice as to our proposed house price, and provided regular email alerts as to the other local properties for sale. • Advice on the presentation of the property for viewing. • Provided an Open House weekend, and gave feedback on the results. • Prompt replies to emails and phone queries, she phoned us, in the UK seven days a week. • Identified that we needed an old underground oil tank plus a large tree removed. These tasks were accomplished expertly by recommended first-rate tradesmen who quickly carried out the work. • Contacted local authorities and our Solicitor when necessary. To summarize Heather went extra miles and miles for us going beyond our expectations. We had an offer on the property, which was above our asking price three days after we listed and was very pleased when the house was sold. We would not hesitate to recommend Heather, and if she sold properties in the UK would be using her services here as well, (subtle hint Heather!)
